ygData.subject: Re: A rant
ygData.msgSnippet: In my intial post (maybe the second one, it was this AM) I spent a whole paragraph saying how this wasn t a bash on lvl 50 players, and how I d be one if I
ygData.messageBody:
In my intial post (maybe the second one, it was this AM) I spent a whole
paragraph saying how this wasn't a bash on lvl 50 players, and how I'd
be one if I hadn't stopped playing for like 5 months... Thats not where
I'm getting at all. My annoyance comes from every time Verant feels
compelled to keep the dragons challenging for the current crop of lvl
50's. They are not considering the people who aren't there yet...
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
